heading: 1 Name
text: incorporated name body shall “Evangel Presbytery, Inc.”

heading: 2 Object
text: object body fulfill requirements Presbytery set forth Book Church Order Evangel Presbytery (BCO 15.8; hereafter, “Book Church Order” “BCO”). doctrinal governmental standards Presbytery shall stated Book Church Order (Preface, C). Bylaws conflict Book Church Order, case conflict, standards Book Church Order shall take precedence.
